original_title: タケルノープランドライブ
overview: One fine day, Ryunosuke Kamiki suddenly kidnaps Takeru Satoh to take him on a healing trip. From Ryu-chan's zero plans on what to do on the trips, to Takeru-san's constant worries about the possibility of the project being canceled, a mini-van suddenly appears to force a trip on Takeru-san.
title: Takeru No Plan Drive
